tasks.title: Conduct User Feedback Survey
tasks.description: Prepare and distribute a survey to collect user feedback on the new features.

tasks.title: Configure CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up automated build, test, and deployment workflow for the application.
tasks.note: Integrate with GitLab CI and add environment-specific variables.

tasks.title: Prepare Monthly Sales Report
tasks.description: Compile sales data from CRM and generate the monthly performance report.

tasks.title: Design Landing Page Mockup
tasks.description: Create a UI/UX mockup for the new marketing landing page.
tasks.note: Use the updated brand color palette.

tasks.title: Team Standup Meeting
tasks.description: Attend the daily standup meeting to discuss progress and blockers.

tasks.title: Customer Onboarding Call
tasks.description: Guide the client through initial setup and platform features.

tasks.title: Database Backup Verification
tasks.description: Verify that automated backups are running correctly and test restore.
tasks.note: Perform restore on staging DB only.

tasks.title: Write API Documentation
tasks.description: Document the new endpoints added for the user authentication module.

tasks.title: Update Product Pricing
tasks.description: Modify pricing plans on the website and admin dashboard.
tasks.note: Publish changes after legal team approval.

tasks.title: Bug Fix: Login Timeout Issue
tasks.description: Investigate and resolve the issue causing user sessions to expire prematurely.
tasks.note: Reproduce issue using QA test accounts.

tasks.title: Conduct Code Review
tasks.description: Review pull request #148 for code quality, performance, and security issues.
tasks.note: Pay attention to new dependency additions.

tasks.title: Employee Training Session
tasks.description: Provide onboarding training to the new intern joining the tech team.

tasks.title: Inventory Stock Check
tasks.description: Check warehouse stock levels and update the inventory management system.
tasks.note: Notify procurement if any items fall below threshold.

tasks.title: Email Marketing Campaign Setup
tasks.description: Set up and schedule the promotional email campaign for next week.

tasks.title: Optimize Database Queries
tasks.description: Identify slow SQL queries and optimize them for better performance.
tasks.note: Start with user and order tables.

tasks.title: Website Security Audit
tasks.description: Run a security scan and review potential vulnerabilities.

tasks.title: Prepare Presentation Slides
tasks.description: Create slides for the quarterly review meeting with stakeholders.

tasks.title: Update User Permissions
tasks.description: Adjust user roles and permissions based on the latest policy changes.

tasks.title: Social Media Content Plan
tasks.description: Prepare a weekly content schedule for all social media platforms.

tasks.title: Server Maintenance Cleanup
tasks.description: Remove unused logs, rotate old files, and free up server disk space.

tasks.title: Implement Two-Factor Authentication
tasks.description: Add 2FA to the user login flow to enhance account security.
tasks.note: Support both SMS and authenticator app methods.

tasks.title: Set Up Automated Daily Backups
tasks.description: Configure automatic daily backups for the database and critical application files.
tasks.note: Ensure backup integrity and retention for at least 30 days.
